active_learning.discussion_prompt: Debate the trade-offs of deploying PE-20 technologies (e.g., RFID vs. GPS) in terms of security benefits versus privacy risks, referencing federal laws and NIST privacy guidance. Consider scenarios involving employee-monitored assets like laptops.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

distractor_protocol.step: Plausible misconceptions: e.g., confuse PE-20 with CM-8 (inventory vs. tracking), ignore privacy/laws, select wrong tech (e.g., CCTV instead of RFID/GPS).
Common errors: Overstate scope (all assets vs. organization-defined), omit controlled areas, mix with PE-16 (delivery only).
Balance: 1 distractor per layer/theme; ensure distractors teach by contrast.
